original_title: Testimony: The Untold Story of Pope John Paul II
overview: Michael York narrates this riveting documentary about Pope John Paul II, sharing little-known facts about the pontiff through interviews with his advisor, Cardinal Stanislaw Dziwisz, and never-before-seen footage from his early days. From amusing tidbits about the pope's fondness for karaoke to shocking secrets about an assassination attempt and an exorcism, the film's revelations paint a robust portrait of the much-loved spiritual leader.
title: Testimony: The Untold Story of Pope John Paul II
